search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ClockShark (clockshark.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for ClockShark is: [https://www.clockshark.com/pricing](https://www.clockshark.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Time tracking that fits your business (and budget)
==================================================

Everything you need to automate timesheets, finish jobs, and get paid faster
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Most Popular

Standard
--------

Time tracking with scheduling, geofencing and administrative features designed for small businesses  

$ 40/mo  
**Get ClockShark for free for 14 days.\***  
\+ $9/mo per user

[Sign Up Now](https://www.clockshark.com/signup/trial)No credit card required.

Time and attendance tracking

GPS tracking

Job and task tracking

Built-in Spanish language support

Manager roles and approvals

Draft schedules

Pro
---

Robust time tracking, scheduling, and time off management features for growing businesses and established multi-location businesses  

$ 60/mo  
**Get ClockShark for free for 14 days.\***  
\+ $11/mo per user

[Sign Up Now](https://www.clockshark.com/signup/trial)No credit card required.

Time and attendance tracking

GPS tracking

Job and task tracking

Built-in Spanish language support

Drag and drop scheduling

Manager roles and approvals

Third-party integrations

Draft schedules

Paid time off (PTO)

Multi-department/office controls

Advanced job costing controls

Clock out questions

All plans include
-----------------

![Image 21: Time Tracking Icon](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1679333502-icon-time-tracking-orange.png)

### Time & Attendance Tracking

Easily track time from Android & iOS mobile apps or the website.

![Image 22: Scheduling Icon](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1678219019-icon-scheduling-orange.png)

### Drag & Drop Scheduling

Share schedules with people including a job and/or task assignment. Add job-related documents, addresses and notes.

![Image 23: Customer Support Icon](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1678222011-icon-customer-support-orange.png)

### 5-star rated customer support

All plans include 5-star rated customer support from real humans standing by to answer any of your questions.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### \*What do I get with the free trial?

![Image 24: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

Trial accounts are provisioned with all the features of the Pro plan for 14 days. When you sign up to become a customer, your account information, employee information, jobs, and timesheet data stays put. No need to re-enter anything! We know one pay period may not be enough, so if you need to extend your trial just message us and we’d be happy to help out.

### \*How long is the free trial?

![Image 25: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

Your trial lasts fourteen (14) days.

### What currency does ClockShark use?

![Image 26: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

Pricing shown and billing is invoiced in US dollars.

Pricing shown and billing is invoiced in Australian dollars and exclude GST

### What is considered an active user?

![Image 27: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

ClockShark customers can activate and deactivate users as needed for their business, and we’ll pro-rate the invoice. You’ll only pay for users that are active, for the days they were active. We don’t believe in nickel-and-diming!

### What kind of support do I get?

![Image 28: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

All ClockShark customers get live help and setup assistance from our 5-star support team, even during the trial period. Pro plan customers can schedule time with a customer success representative for personal onboarding, which can be used for data mapping, implementing integrations, discussing our favorite sharks, and other activities.

9,500+ companies use ClockShark to track employees and save time every month.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Sign Up Now](https://www.clockshark.com/signup/trial)No credit card required.

###### Support Hours

United States/North America (times shown in PT)

**Monday:** 5 am to 8:30 pm  
**Tuesday:** 5 am to 8:30 pm  
**Wednesday:** 5 am to 8:30 pm  
**Thursday:** 5 am to 8:30 pm  
**Friday:** 5 am to 12 pm  
**Saturday:** closed

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a base fee plus a per-user fee. Free trial includes all features of the Pro plan.

Robust time tracking, scheduling, and time off management features for growing businesses and established multi-location businesses.

All plans include
-----------------

![Image 21: Time Tracking Icon](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1679333502-icon-time-tracking-orange.png)

### Time & Attendance Tracking

Easily track time from Android & iOS mobile apps or the website.

![Image 22: Scheduling Icon](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1678219019-icon-scheduling-orange.png)

### Drag & Drop Scheduling

Share schedules with people including a job and/or task assignment. Add job-related documents, addresses and notes.

![Image 23: Customer Support Icon](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1678222011-icon-customer-support-orange.png)

### 5-star rated customer support

All plans include 5-star rated customer support from real humans standing by to answer any of your questions.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### \*What do I get with the free trial?

![Image 24: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

Trial accounts are provisioned with all the features of the Pro plan for 14 days. When you sign up to become a customer, your account information, employee information, jobs, and timesheet data stays put. No need to re-enter anything! We know one pay period may not be enough, so if you need to extend your trial just message us and we’d be happy to help out.

### \*How long is the free trial?

![Image 25: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

Your trial lasts fourteen (14) days.

### What currency does ClockShark use?

![Image 26: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

Pricing shown and billing is invoiced in US dollars.

Pricing shown and billing is invoiced in Australian dollars and exclude GST

### What is considered an active user?

![Image 27: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

ClockShark customers can activate and deactivate users as needed for their business, and we’ll pro-rate the invoice. You’ll only pay for users that are active, for the days they were active. We don’t believe in nickel-and-diming!

### What kind of support do I get?

![Image 28: Expand FAQ section](https://www.datocms-assets.com/16247/1687551182-icon-plus.svg)

All ClockShark customers get live help and setup assistance from our 5-star support team, even during the trial period. Pro plan customers can schedule time with a customer success representative for personal onboarding, which can be used for data mapping, implementing integrations, discussing our favorite sharks, and other activities.

9,500+ companies use ClockShark to track employees and save time every month.
